```{python}
import functai
import os
import mlflow

# Tell MLflow about the server URI.
mlflow.set_tracking_uri("http://127.0.0.1:5000")
# Create a unique name for your experiment.
mlflow.autolog()

mlflow.set_experiment("functai")

functai.configure(lm="gpt-4.1")
```
